message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $120. I think you'll really appreciate its value and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $105, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $98?
I'm getting close to the price I'm willing to sell at, Bob. I can meet you at $102, but I'm not going any lower than that.
I'm really close to walking away, but I still think this product would be a great fit for me. Would you be willing to meet me at $99?
